original_text: So the Lord was very angry with Israel and removed them from his presence. Only the tribe of Judah was left,
korean_text: 여호와께서 이스라엘에게 심히 노하사 그들을 그의 앞에서 제거하시니 오직 유다 지파 외에는 남은 자가 없으니라

sentences.original_text: So the Lord was very angry with Israel
and removed them from his presence
Only the tribe of Judah was left
